inputs.name: paths
inputs.label: Paths
inputs.helpMarkDown: File paths to upload, supports multiple lines of match patterns.

inputs.name: bucket
inputs.label: Bucket Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the bucket to which files are to be uploaded.

inputs.name: keyfile
inputs.label: Keyfile
inputs.helpMarkDown: Secure file containing the JSON GCP keyfile credentials needed to write to the requested bucket.

inputs.name: destinationDirectory
inputs.label: Destination Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional directory in the bucket where you want the files to be uploaded, if not provided files are uploaded to the root of the bucket.

inputs.name: clear
inputs.label: Clear Destination
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally clear the entire destination directory if specified. If there is no destination directory specified the entire bucket will be cleared of all files.
